item.title: GPU passthrough for RX6600XT
item.description: A Comprehensive Guide on GPU Passthroughs in Proxmox Some Prerequisites and Notes This method of passing through my GPU works for: Kernel: 5.15.30 Proxmox Version 7.2 TUF Gaming X570 Plus Motherboard Dual Radeon RX6600XT Asus GPU Ryzen 7 5800X CPU In the BIOs for your host computer (where Proxmox is installed) settings, these options should be modified: Secure boot: Off CPU Settings: SUM: On PSS: On PCI Subsystem Settings: Above 4G Encoding: On SR-IOV Support: On AMD CBS: IOMMU: On The Passthrough Process This is the part of the process where everything is either done in an ssh session, on the host computer’s shell, or the webGUI for proxmox.
